context.content: "The Maze Runner" is a gripping sci-fi novel that follows the story of Thomas, who wakes up in a mysterious maze with no memory of his past. He joins a group of boys who are also trapped in the maze, and together they must navigate the deadly labyrinth and uncover its secrets. The main characters are diverse and dynamic, each with their own strengths and personalities, adding depth to the thrilling adventure.
